idea-plugin.name: Java Code Helper
idea-plugin.description:
For learning plug-in development。Exchange ideas 、 Feed back BUG：Gitee

  • Automatic completionContributor
    In the construction method, complete the field assignment
    In the non construction method, complete the code according to the characters entered
  • Fast Jump
    Support fast jump between feign and controller. Click the jump icon to jump
    Support quick jump of sql and java
  • Translation
    At present, only Baidu Translation is supported. You need to apply for Baidu Translation Platform account and translate 1 million characters for free every month
    After configuring the account in the idea, select the text to be translated, right click and select JavaCodeHelp>Translate
  • One click Add API annotation
    Api annotations can be added with just one click based on the annotation.Currently, only Swagger is supported
    Right click and select JavaCodeHelp>AddApiAnnotation
  • Code Check
    Method not called in feign, method name grayed out
    Continuously adding.
  • Code Statistics
    After the module in the project file tree, the total number of code lines for that module will be noted
    Currently, comment judgment only supports .java and .xml files
  • Generate code according to the table creating SQL
    It is mainly used for learning plug-in development. Its functions are relatively simple. It is recommended to use other more perfect plug-ins to generate code

很蛋疼，官方要求必须英文开始

用于学习插件开发。交流想法、反馈BUG ：Gitee

  • 自动补全
    构造方法内，补全字段赋值
    非构造方法内，根据输入的字符，补全代码
  • 快捷跳转
    支持feign与controller的快捷跳转，点击图标跳转
    支持sql与java的快捷跳转
  • 翻译
    目前仅支持百度翻译，需申请百度翻译平台账号，每月免费翻译100万字符
    在idea中配置账号后，选中待翻译文本，右击选择JavaCodeHelp > Translate
  • 一键添加api注解
    可根据注释一键添加Api注解。目前仅支持swagger
    右击选择JavaCodeHelp > AddApiAnnotation
  • 代码检查
    feign中方法未被调用，方法名置灰
    陆续新增中...
  • 代码统计
    项目文件树中的模块后会备注上该模块的总代码行数
  • 根据建表SQL生成代码
    主要用于学习插件开发，功能比较单一，建议使用其他更完善的插件去生成代码
    目前注释判断仅支持.java、.xml文件
